2025-05-14.title: JP Morgan Signals Caution On Plug Power's Near-Term Challenges, Withdraws Price Forecast
JP Morgan, Goldman Sachs cut back US recession forecasts after US-China announce tariff truce
2025-05-14.description: Easing trade tensions between the US and China have prompted major brokerages like Goldman Sachs and JP Morgan to revise their US recession forecasts. Goldman Sachs reduced its recession estimate to 35%, while JP Morgan places the probability below 50%.
